description:
Our junction boxes are waterproof IP65 rated electric enclosure that has been UV-resistant for outdoor use. The mounting holes are strategically placed to minimize the unsightly screw heads on top of the cover and provide plenty of space for wiring connections inside. Made from tough ABS plastic with rubber coating its exterior, this junction box will look clean and last a long time outdoors or in your home's basement!

The Junction Box waterproof IP65 ABS stainless steel enclosure is made of high-quality materials, with all INSIDE parts sealed. It provides complete protection for electrical product installation and gives peace of mind to anyone who uses it. A slot in the middle of the cover for power supply cable connection makes wiring easier and faster mounting on a stand, etc.

Browse our wide range of junction boxes and choose one that fits your project. All orders are processed within 24 hours of purchase.
name: Junction Boxes
